rules.name: CPC_VIP_PO_Queue
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 29) AND (7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27 OR 28) AND 30

rules.name: CPC_PO_Queue
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18) AND 19
rules.label: CPC PO Queue
